events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the product I got is different from what I ordered.
The reported issue involves a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product instead of the ordered one.
An agent from the refund department has been assigned to handle this request and will be reaching out shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received as well as the order number to help process your refund faster?
Here is the photo of the product I received, and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds great, thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help with sorting out the refund.
The refund request has been successfully processed and you should see the amount reflected on your statement shortly.
We just wanted to follow up to ensure that you received your refund and everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund has been completed and you confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this support case now.
